page.title: 10HOME LIFE 1.
page.content: Traditional home life is undergoing a revolution in the urban part of the area. In 20 years it has moved from the basis of husband as breadwinner, to husband and wife working, to husband and wife not working. Marriages have become less stable and there has been a large increase in one parent families Is it the economic situation or the low value put on family life by Society? The obvious results are the high proportion of separations or divorce or couples just living together; the less obvious results are manifest in the behaviour patterns of children and the psychological problems arising from the many tensions they face.
